samples.question: So could you describe something you do to keep fit and healthy?
samples.transcript: Oh, I am always on the diet and I am running. Yeah, in the mornings. this case, sometimes I am going to the gym, but it is not scheduled. it is like when I am passionate, I am going to the gym, and take personal training. but, I do not think so. it is, so healthy because it can be shadowed. Sometimes you do that. Sometimes you do not do that. And it is like some kind of, I want to do that or no. And running is passionate for me. I have, how to say, some stuff for that. Yeah. And do that every morning. Even if I feel bored, I will do that. And second part is diet because when you do sports but eating wherever you want, it is impossible to get a good fit.. So that is about one minute of speaking now. All right. Nice, nice.
